oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dedication of Housing Projects, 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Mayor Ben West, Charles Slusser, commissioner of the U.S. Public Housing Administration (left), Project Manager Deerwood McCord (second from left), and two unidentified men at the dedication of Nashville's newest public housing projects, 12 November 1954. The Nashville Housing Authority had completed seven projects since World War II, including additions to the James A. Cayce Homes, the Preston Taylor Homes, and Sam Levy Homes. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; Slusser, Charles E., 1897-1963
